Akial Interference.description: Accomplish Classified Objectives, interfere with enemy comms via the Akial Antenna!

B-Pong.description: BOING! Control the Tracking Beacon and push it into enemy territory!

Corporate Appropriation.description: Capture the enemy Prototype, protect or destroy yours!

Critical Intervention.description: Attacker vs Defender - Extract the Data Pack from the Server Room!

Crossing Lines.description: Dominate Dead Zones and Activate Antennas in crossed deployment zones!

Hardlock.description: Control enemy Beacons and Activate Consoles!

Last Launch.description: Extract Troopers via the Launching Tower, kill enemy Specialists!

Provisioning.description: Control Supply Boxes and deposit them in your Safe Area!

Zone of Interest.description: Dominate Zones of Interest and control the Communication Antenna!

Annihilation.description: Team Deathmatch! Kill more army points and the enemy Lieutenant!

Battleground.description: Control 3 horizontal Sectors, use your Key Ops!

Cutthroat.description: Kill enemy Lieutenants and use your Key Ops to score kills!

Superiority.description: Dominate Quadrants, Hack Consoles, have a Dominant Key Ops!

Uplink Center.description: Activate and Control Communication Antennas and the Tech-Coffin! Keep your LT alive!

Narrative Mission / BAMS.description: Deliberate among yourselves, shoot a steindrage maybe
